content: All Curios items in Black Myth: Wukong can't be upgraded, so you aren't able to increase their power or potency. Therefore, you will want to switch to other Curios items to better fit your build as you . This can be done at any point from the Equipment menu.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Tiger_Tally.md', within the main section titled 'Tiger Tally'.
The content is as follows:
All Curios items in Black Myth: Wukong can't be upgraded, so you aren't able to increase their power or potency. Therefore, you will want to switch to other Curios items to better fit your build as you . This can be done at any point from the Equipment menu.
